pages.text:
X
TIE UP IN PARADISE
The Yacht Haven Marina is a hurricane protected port located deep up Fort Lauderdale’s New River and featuring 55 side-tie slips that can accommodate yachts up to 150’. The docks wind around our five-star motorcoach resort, making it the perfect home for all your toys – land and sea.
EASY IN. EASY OUT.
Located along Fort Lauderdale’s New River, our side-tie slips make for worry-free docking and our ideal location means you have quick access to the Intracoastal and Atlantic Ocean.
To learn more or to make a reservation, call:
877.445.2127
EXPERT MARINA TEAM
Our top-notch marina staff is always at the ready. Enjoy expert docking assistance and know that your vessel is being catered to by professionals as you unwind at the resort or head into town.
To learn more or to make a reservation, call:
877.445.2127
YACHT HAVEN AMENITIES
We’re more than a world-class marina. We’re a world-class resort and as our guest you enjoy full access to all our amenities – pool and sundeck, recreation area, fitness center, laundry, shower, and restroom facilities, paddleboards, kayaks, and more.
Learn More
SAFE HARBOR
Yacht Haven isn’t just convenient, it’s secure. We’re tucked away deep up the New River in a protected “hurricane hole” which means your pride and joy is as safe and secure as possible should a storm develop.
Learn More
ALL-IN-ONE
Keep all your toys in one place. Dock your yacht. Park your motorcoach. Enjoy the best of both worlds and have plenty of room for your crew support vehicle, motorbikes, and any other recreational gear.
Make a Reservation

X
MADE FOR YOU
Arrive by luxury motorcoach or tie up your yacht along our private docks. Either way, prepare to discover a Fort Lauderdale resort like no other. Welcome to Yacht Haven Park & Marina – family friendly, pet friendly, your Fort Lauderdale resort and open ticket to the best of South Florida.
THE RESORT
Yacht Haven is the only destination in Fort Lauderdale designed entirely with motorcoach and yachting enthusiasts in mind. Those with a passion for travel, a true spirit of adventure, and an insistence on the finer things in life will find our paradise has everything you desire.
Exquisite motorcoach sites, sweeping waterfront views, a gorgeous tropical pool, a host of watersports, and an exceptional service team exist to make your stay absolutely perfect. Minutes away lie the white beaches, bustling nightlife, five-star eateries, and designer boutiques of downtown Fort Lauderdale, Miami and The Palm Beaches. If golf is your game, you’ll find countless championship options nearby and we’ll be happy to arrange your tee-times.
To learn more or to make a reservation, call:
954.583.2322
By Land
Yacht Haven boasts 222 sites created for the most discriminating RV enthusiast. We offer a variety of ways to stay with us, including peaceful dock-side waterfront, sensational sites on the New River, and quiet garden sites.
Whichever you prefer, you’ll be steps from our resort amenities and anything else you might need is always just a quick stroll or call away.
Resort Amenities
By Sea
The Yacht Haven Marina accommodates vessels up to 150’ in length and provides full hookups. We offer dockage along Fort Lauderdale’s New River and our own Yacht Haven finger canals, all of which offer easy access to Florida’s Intracoastal Waterway and the Atlantic Ocean. Our marina staff will see to it that your vessel is properly cared for as you enjoy the amenities of our resort.
Learn More
